author: daxian-dbw
body:
Partially fix #3923

The releasing documentation is updated to reflect the desired release steps and the order to do those steps. The contents are rearranged focusing on the `Release Steps` -- if a release step should be elaborated, a section can be created below to describe the step in details and an in-doc link can be used to connect the step to the section. For example, currently, there are sections about `build packages`, `create NuGet packages`, `create release tag` and `update hombrew formula`.

This is the initial draft of the change, waiting on comments to improve.

@TravisEz13 I didn't change the [`Side-By-Side Design` part](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/3938/files#diff-7b3a0a87ddfb890682f6856a8acbaa8fR83) about the packaging on Unix. Can you please do a pass over that paragraph to see if anything needs to be changed there?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Let's delay the discussion for Side-by-Side.  We will meet tomorrow about portable Linux which will affect packaging.

title: Update the releasing documentation to reflect the desired release steps and order
